strings.Value: "All right, I need your ideas! Who is that Storyteller who's living in the capital? How could an elf look so old? It shouldn't be possible!"
"You meet all kinds of freaks. He's not nearly the worst."
"I thought about that. Did he find a way to prolong his life, but paid for it with his youth and beauty? Death is more merciful than life, in such an ugly old body. I could never stand it."
"He's a Storyteller, is he not? He has many stories to tell. This may be one of them. Meanwhile, I'd say he's just a common half-elf, plain and simple."
"I feel that he's much more than he appears. I sense true power within him, but not power corrupted by evil. Whoever he is, he might make a valuable ally."

"I've been asking myself the same question. No scientific treatises hold any solid information about the aging of elves. Either our Storyteller has fallen victim to a powerful magic, or he's a liar, plain and simple."
"Maybe he's a spirit pretending to be mortal so he can watch us? But is he a good spirit, or an evil one..."
"Maybe he's a spirit pretending to be mortal so he can watch us? But is he a good spirit, or an evil one..."
